dbConfig.query: SELECT district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id, CASE WHEN pupil_data_indicator IN (670, 675, 680, 685) THEN 'domestic' WHEN pupil_data_indicator IN (700, 705, 710, 715, 720, 725, 730) THEN 'individual' WHEN pupil_data_indicator IN (760, 765, 770) THEN 'school' WHEN pupil_data_indicator IN (790, 795, 800) THEN 'environmental' WHEN pupil_data_indicator = 805 THEN 'financial' WHEN pupil_data_indicator = 655 THEN 'other' END as cause, SUM(male) as male, SUM(female) as female FROM school s, report_history rh, enrollment_pupil_summary e WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND e.report_history_id = rh.id AND grade_level_id IN (405, 98, 99, 100, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105, 106, 107, 108, 109) AND pupil_data_indicator IN (670, 675, 680, 685, 700, 705, 710, 715, 720, 725, 730, 760, 765, 770, 790, 795, 800, 805, 655) AND rh.report_id IN (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id, cause;
SELECT ref_office_id as district_id, office_name, sy_from, parent_office as division_id FROM ref_office_history WHERE office_type = 193 AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id, program_id, SUM(enrolled_male) as male, SUM(enrolled_female) as female FROM school s, report_history rh, enrollment_program_summary e WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND e.report_history_id = rh.id AND grade_level_id IN (105, 106, 107, 108, 109) AND program_id IN (35, 27, 28, 29, 32, 33, 34) AND rh.report_id IN (1, 2) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id, program_id;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, IF(report_id = 24, 433, 434) as education_level, 'female' as gender, sum(quantity) as count FROM school s, report_history rh, inventory_summary i WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND i.report_history_id = rh.id AND item_id IN (380, 384) AND rh.report_id in (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, education_level, gender
UNION
SELECT district_id, sy_from, IF(report_id = 24, 433, 434) as education_level, 'male' as gender, sum(quantity * IF(item_id = 382, 3, 1)) as count FROM school s, report_history rh, inventory_summary i WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND i.report_history_id = rh.id AND item_id IN (381, 382, 383, 384) AND rh.report_id in (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, education_level, gender;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, indicator_id, SUM(gpnMale), SUM(gpdMale), SUM(gpnFemale), SUM(gpdFemale), SUM(g1nMale), SUM(g1dMale), SUM(g1nFemale), SUM(g1dFemale), SUM(g2nMale), SUM(g2dMale), SUM(g2nFemale), SUM(g2dFemale), SUM(g3nMale), SUM(g3dMale), SUM(g3nFemale), SUM(g3dFemale), SUM(g4nMale), SUM(g4dMale), SUM(g4nFemale), SUM(g4dFemale), SUM(g5nMale), SUM(g5dMale), SUM(g5nFemale), SUM(g5dFemale), SUM(g6nMale), SUM(g6dMale), SUM(g6nFemale), SUM(g6dFemale) FROM pi_summary WHERE indicator_id IN (430, 457) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND NOT(ISNULL(district_id)) GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, indicator_id;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, education_level_id, 'Desks' as type, sum(quantity) as count FROM school s, report_history rh, inventory_summary i WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND i.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id in (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND item_id = 370
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, education_level_id
UNION
SELECT district_id, sy_from, education_level_id, 'Chairs/Armchairs' as type, sum(quantity * IF(item_id = 370, 2, 1)) as count FROM school s, report_history rh, inventory_summary i WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND i.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id in (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND item_id IN (370, 930)
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, education_level_id;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, IF(report_id = 24, 433, 434) as education_level, item_id as repair_state, sum(quantity) as count FROM school s, report_history rh, inventory_summary i WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND i.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id in (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND item_id IN (491, 490)
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, education_level, item_id;
SELECT ref_region_id, sy_from, office_name FROM ref_office_history WHERE office_type = 191 AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo;

SELECT division_id, sy_from, indicator_id, SUM(gpnMale), SUM(gpdMale), SUM(gpnFemale), SUM(gpdFemale), SUM(g1nMale), SUM(g1dMale), SUM(g1nFemale), SUM(g1dFemale) FROM pi_summary WHERE indicator_id IN (417, 418, 420, 422, 478) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND NOT(ISNULL(division_id)) GROUP BY division_id, sy_from, indicator_id;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id, SUM(male) as male, SUM(female) as female FROM school s, report_history rh, enrollment_pupil_summary e WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND e.report_history_id = rh.id AND grade_level_id IN (405, 98, 99, 100, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105, 106, 107, 108, 109) AND rh.report_id IN (1, 2) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id, pupil_data_indicator as program_id, SUM(male) as male, SUM(female) as female FROM school s, report_history rh, enrollment_pupil_summary e WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND e.report_history_id = rh.id AND grade_level_id IN (405, 98, 99, 100, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105, 106, 107, 108, 109) AND pupil_data_indicator IN (312, 313, 312, 315, 387, 388) AND rh.report_id IN (1, 2) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id, pupil_data_indicator;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, category_level_id as grade_level_id, sn_id, SUM(sn_male) as male, SUM(sn_female) as female FROM school s, report_history rh, enrollment_sp_summary e WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND e.report_history_id = rh.id AND category_level_id IN (405, 98, 99, 100, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105, 106, 107, 108, 109) AND sn_id IN (79, 80, 81, 82, 83, 85, 86, 87, 88, 89, 90, 91) AND rh.report_id IN (1, 2) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, category_level_id, sn_id;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, position_id, SUM(actual_male) as actual_male, SUM(actual_female) as actual_female, SUM(borrowed_male_admin_teacher) as borrowed_male_admin_teacher, SUM(borrowed_female_admin_teacher) as borrowed_female_admin_teacher, SUM(in_school_male) as in_school_male, SUM(in_school_female) as in_school_female
FROM school s, report_history rh, personnel_position_summary p WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND p.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id IN (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND position_id IN (15, 14, 19, 18, 17, 23, 24)
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, position_id
UNION
SELECT district_id, sy_from, 20 as position_id, SUM(actual_male) as actual_male, SUM(actual_female) as actual_female, SUM(borrowed_male_admin_teacher) as borrowed_male_admin_teacher, SUM(borrowed_female_admin_teacher) as borrowed_female_admin_teacher, SUM(in_school_male) as in_school_male, SUM(in_school_female) as in_school_female FROM school s, report_history rh, personnel_position_summary p WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND p.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id IN (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND position_id IN (20, 21, 22)
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, indicator_id, SUM(g1nMale), SUM(g1dMale), SUM(g1nFemale), SUM(g1dFemale) FROM pi_summary WHERE indicator_id IN (450, 452, 429, 431) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND NOT(ISNULL(district_id)) GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, indicator_id;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id, pupil_data_indicator, SUM(male) as male, SUM(female) as female FROM school s, report_history rh, enrollment_pupil_summary e WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND e.report_history_id = rh.id AND grade_level_id IN (405, 98, 99, 100, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105, 106, 107, 108, 109) AND pupil_data_indicator IN (482, 483) AND rh.report_id IN (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id, pupil_data_indicator;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, indicator_id, SUM(gpnMale), SUM(gpdMale), SUM(gpnFemale), SUM(gpdFemale), SUM(g1nMale), SUM(g1dMale), SUM(g1nFemale), SUM(g1dFemale), SUM(g2nMale), SUM(g2dMale), SUM(g2nFemale), SUM(g2dFemale), SUM(g3nMale), SUM(g3dMale), SUM(g3nFemale), SUM(g3dFemale), SUM(g4nMale), SUM(g4dMale), SUM(g4nFemale), SUM(g4dFemale), SUM(g5nMale), SUM(g5dMale), SUM(g5nFemale), SUM(g5dFemale), SUM(g6nMale), SUM(g6dMale), SUM(g6nFemale), SUM(g6dFemale) FROM pi_summary WHERE indicator_id IN (425, 427, 428) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND NOT(ISNULL(district_id)) GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, indicator_id;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, level_id, subject_standard_id, sum(quantity) as total FROM school s, report_history rh, teaching_assignment_summary a WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND a.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id IN (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND category_level_id = 4301 AND level_id IN (490, 491) AND subject_standard_id IN (460, 461, 462)
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, level_id, subject_standard_id
UNION
SELECT district_id, sy_from, level_id, 463 as subject_standard_id, sum(quantity) as total FROM school s, report_history rh, teaching_assignment_summary a WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND a.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id IN (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND category_level_id = 4301 AND level_id IN (490, 491) AND subject_standard_id IN (464, 465, 466, 467)
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, level_id, subject_standard_id
SELECT ref_office_id as division_id, office_name, sy_from, ref_region_id FROM ref_office_history WHERE office_type = 192 AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, position_id, IF(report_id = 24, 433, 434) as education_level, SUM(tot_plantilla_items) as plantilla, SUM(actual_male), SUM(actual_female), SUM(actual_male + actual_female) as actual_total, SUM(tot_onleave) as onleave_total, SUM(tot_plantilla_vacant) as vacant_total, SUM(detailed_male), SUM(detailed_female), SUM(detailed_male + detailed_female) as detailed_total FROM school s, report_history rh, personnel_position_summary p WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND p.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id IN (24, 26) AND sy_from >= 2010 AND sy_from <= 2012
AND position_id IN (15, 14, 19, 18, 17, 23, 24)
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, position_id, education_level
UNION
SELECT district_id, sy_from, 20 as position_id, IF(report_id = 24, 433, 434) as education_level, SUM(tot_plantilla_items) as plantilla, SUM(actual_male), SUM(actual_female), SUM(actual_male + actual_female) as actual_total, SUM(tot_onleave) as onleave_total, SUM(tot_plantilla_vacant) as vacant_total, SUM(detailed_male), SUM(detailed_female), SUM(detailed_male + detailed_female) as detailed_total FROM school s, report_history rh, personnel_position_summary p WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND p.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id IN (24, 26) AND sy_from >= 2010 AND sy_from <= 2012
AND position_id IN (20, 21, 22)
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, education_level;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, education_level_id, item_id, sum(quantity) as count FROM school s, report_history rh, inventory_summary i WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND i.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id in (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND item_id IN (390, 391, 392, 393, 394)
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, education_level_id

SELECT district_id, sy_from, fund_source_id, IF(report_id = 24, 433, 434) as education_level, sum(qty) as count FROM school s, report_history rh, inventory_fund_source i WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND i.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id in (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND type_of_usage_id = 338 # instructional rooms only AND fund_source_id IN (825, 830, 835, 840, 845, 850, 855, 860)
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, fund_source_id, education_level;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, type_of_usage_id, fund_source_id, sum(qty) as count FROM school s, report_history rh, inventory_fund_source i WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND i.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id in (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND type_of_usage_id IN (342, 343, 344) AND fund_source_id IN (825, 835, 840, 845, 850, 853, 855, 860)
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, type_of_usage_id, fund_source_id;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, education_level_id, item_id, sum(quantity) as count FROM school s, report_history rh, inventory_summary i WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND i.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id in (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND item_id IN (395, 396, 397, 398)
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, item_id, education_level_id;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id, SUM(enroll_male), SUM(enroll_female) FROM school s, report_history rh, enrollment_age_summary a WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND a.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id IN (1, 2) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo
AND ( (grade_level_id = 405 AND age_category_id IN (228, 229, 230, 231, 232)) -- KG - 6 yrs OR (grade_level_id = 98 AND age_category_id IN (229, 230, 231, 232)) -- Gr 1 - 7 yrs OR (grade_level_id = 99 AND age_category_id IN (230, 231, 232)) -- Gr 2 - 8 yrs OR (grade_level_id = 100 AND age_category_id IN (231, 232, 233)) -- Gr 3 - 9 yrs OR (grade_level_id = 101 AND age_category_id IN (232, 233)) -- Gr 4 - 10 yrs OR (grade_level_id = 102 AND age_category_id IN (233)) -- Gr 5 - 11 yrs OR (grade_level_id IN (98, 99, 100, 101, 102, 103) AND age_category_id IN (189, 205, 206, 439, 484, 489)) -- Gr 6 - 12 yrs )
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id
UNION
SELECT district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id, SUM(enroll_male), SUM(enroll_female) FROM school s, report_history rh, enrollment_age_summary a WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND a.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id IN (1, 2) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND ( grade_level_id = 105 AND age_category_id > 243 -- Gr 7 - 13 yrs OR grade_level_id = 106 AND age_category_id > 244 -- Yr 2 - 14 yrs OR grade_level_id = 107 AND age_category_id > 245 -- Yr 3 - 15 yrs OR grade_level_id = 108 AND age_category_id > 246 -- Yr 4 - 17 yrs )
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, grade_level_id;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, connection_type_id, connection_profile_id as connection_use, SUM(connection_figure) as count FROM school s, report_history rh, internet_connectivity i WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND i.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id in (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND connection_type_id IN (910, 912, 914, 916) AND connection_profile_id IN (920, 922)
GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, connection_type_id, connection_profile_id;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, indicator_id, SUM(g1nMale), SUM(g1dMale), SUM(g1nFemale), SUM(g1dFemale), SUM(g2nMale), SUM(g2dMale), SUM(g2nFemale), SUM(g2dFemale), SUM(g3nMale), SUM(g3dMale), SUM(g3nFemale), SUM(g3dFemale), SUM(g4nMale), SUM(g4dMale), SUM(g4nFemale), SUM(g4dFemale), SUM(g5nMale), SUM(g5dMale), SUM(g5nFemale), SUM(g5dFemale) FROM pi_summary WHERE indicator_id IN (451, 458) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND NOT(ISNULL(district_id)) GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, indicator_id;

SELECT district_id, year, grade, subj_id, SUM(ROUND(superior * num_students / 100 )) as superior, SUM(ROUND(meet * num_students / 100)) as meet, SUM(ROUND(below * num_students / 100)) as below, SUM(ROUND(poor * num_students / 100)) as poor, ROUND(SUM(mps * num_students)) as score, SUM(num_students) as students FROM nat.standardscores scores, school schools WHERE schools.id = scores.sch_id AND year >= @syFrom AND year <= @syTo GROUP BY district_id, year, grade, subj_id;
SELECT @syFrom := 2010, @syTo := 2012;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, position_id, sum(actual_male) as male, sum(actual_female) as female FROM school s, report_history rh, personnel_position_summary p WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND p.report_history_id = rh.id AND rh.report_id IN (24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from > 2010 AND sy_from <= @syTo AND position_id IN (120, 121, 122, 123, 124, 125) GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, position_id;
SELECT 1 as id, "Philippines" as name;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, indicator_id, SUM(g1nMale), SUM(g1dMale), SUM(g1nFemale), SUM(g1dFemale), SUM(g2nMale), SUM(g2dMale), SUM(g2nFemale), SUM(g2dFemale), SUM(g3nMale), SUM(g3dMale), SUM(g3nFemale), SUM(g3dFemale), SUM(g4nMale), SUM(g4dMale), SUM(g4nFemale), SUM(g4dFemale), SUM(g5nMale), SUM(g5dMale), SUM(g5nFemale), SUM(g5dFemale) FROM pi_summary WHERE indicator_id IN (441, 446, 448, 449, 479, 443) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo AND NOT(ISNULL(district_id)) GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, indicator_id;

SELECT district_id, sy_from, IF(rh.report_id in (1, 24), 'elementary', 'secondary') as education_level, IF(IsNull(class_organization_id), 26, class_organization_id) as class_organization, COUNT(DISTINCT rh.school_id) as schools FROM school s, report_history rh WHERE s.id = rh.school_id AND rh.report_id in (1, 2, 24, 26) AND sy_from >= @syFrom AND sy_from <= @syTo GROUP BY district_id, sy_from, education_level, class_organization;
